name: Smashbox X Becca Under Eye Brightening Corrector
about: What it is:A fan-favorite color corrector that uses reflective light to brighten the look of under-eye circles. BECCAu2019s most-loved color corrector finds a new home at Smashbox..Highlighted Ingredients:- Peach- and Apricot-Tinted Pigments: Correct color and neutralize blue tones under the eyes..Ingredient Callouts:Free of parabens, formaldehydes, phthalates, mineral oil, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. It is also vegan, gluten-free, and cruelty-free..What Else You Need to Know:This cream uses backlight technology, infused with peach- and apricot-toned color correctors, as well as light-reflecting illuminators to deflect light away from dark circles under the eyes. It is also formulated with vitamin E, which smooths skin around the eyes and creates an even base for concealer.
ingredients: -Peach- and Apricot-Tinted Pigments: Correct color and neutralize blue tones under the eyes..-Backlight Technology: Instantly brightens and illuminates under the eyes..-Vitamin E: Nourishes...Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Polybutene, Rhus Verniciflua Peel Wax, Kaolin, C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate, Barium Sulfate, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Squalane, Hydrogenated Polycyclopentadiene, Trihydroxystearin, Sodium Lauroyl Aspartate, Aluminum Hydroxide, Sorbitan Sesquioleate, Isopropyl Titanium Triisostearate, Zinc Chloride, Caprylyl Glycol, Hexylene Glycol, Tocopherol, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Tetrahexyldecyl Ascorbate, Phenoxyethanol, [+/- Mica, Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491), Iron Oxides (CI 77492), Iron Oxides (CI 77499), Aluminum Powder (CI 77000), Bronze Powder (CI 77400), Bismuth Oxychloride (CI 77163), Chromium Oxide Greens (CI 77288), Chromium Hydroxide Green (CI 77289), Copper Powder (CI 77400), Ferric Ammonium Ferrocyanide (CI 77510), Ferric Ferrocyanide (CI 77510), Manganese Violet (CI 77742), Ultramarines (CI 77007), Blue 1 Lake (CI 42090), Yellow 5 Lake (CI 19140)]. ..Please be aware that ingredient lists may change or vary from time to time. Please refer to the ingredient list on the product package you receive for the most up-to-date list of ingredients.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Warm up the product between fingertips..-Gently pat under eye, starting from the outer corner and blending inward..-If desired, finish with your favorite concealer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is definitely not a full coverage concealer.  It IS a fabulous corrector and brightener!  It makes me look less tired by itself, but it makes the biggest difference as a colour correcting base under concealer!  It makes the difference in camouflaging my dark circles that no concealer can do by itself. Here's the KEY:  Use the tiniest amount, warmed between the fingertips of your ring fingers, then gently pat into your dark circles.  If it's creasing, you used too much, so pat some off.  The miniscule amount needed makes the little jar last a really long time!

reviews.review_text: I like this concealer because it blends easily with my skin tone, is not cakey, and manages to brighten my under eyes a bit. That being said, this is NOT full coverage. I honestly don't know how they are allowed to call it that. It is a sheer, shiny, concealer that gives a bit of life to my under eyes when I don't want to wear full foundation/concealer.

reviews.review_title: Wish they had it in store to match shade
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wasnu2019t sure which shade to choose and an advisor in store suggested I go for the medium. I wish I would have gone for the fair because I feel that the medium is too orange on my under eye circles. Though it does help, it isnu2019t as great as I expected. I will say that I have hereditary dark under eye circles (thanks, grandma) so no product has ever made them go away. Now that I have some fine lines, and I am in my late 30u2019s, I am trying products that are aging skin friendly.

This color corrector was recommended by Lili Ghalichi when she did a video explaining that she uses this to cover her dark circles. Im so glad I bought it because it works wonders! You won't regret it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I REALLY wanted to love this product but it doesnu2019t lay well on my skin. I cannot get it to do on even and actually makes the area look worse. I can see how so many people enjoy this product and it is a lot of product and should last a long while as you only use very little at a time. reviews.review_title: Not what I was looking for
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Pros: - thick, creamy, comfortable texture - dewy/radiant finish  - decent amount of product in the jar compared to some similar products Cons: - Not enough coverage for truly dark circles. It's more for brightening if you have mild dark circles.  - No shade works for me as a one-and-done concealer. I have light-medium warm skin tone and the lightest is too pink/light while the medium is too dark/orange.   Since I have the medium shade that's too dark for me, I might keep it as a color corrector to use under another concealer when I'm doing a full face of makeup. But I was looking for something to use on no-makeup days when I just want to put on a bit and go, and this wasn't it for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_title: Will I Repurchase? Definitely. Perfect? Not Quite.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: In short, I'll definitely be grabbing another one. It's actually the only dark circles makeup I've ever gone back for. But perfect? Nah. Here's the long version: I've battled dark undereye circles since my teenage years, and now at 33, they're still going strong. Add in my oily skin, and I'm on a never-ending quest to find something that really works. This product caught my eye after endless Googling and YouTube deep-dives into makeup reviews. After almost using up the whole thing, here's my take: It's a color corrector, so yeah, it's pretty orange. But hey, my circles needed that color correction. Works okay by itself, but it's a real winner under a concealer (I go for the bareMinerals powder one). It's not the longest-lasting solo act, but it's my go-to for low-effort work-from-home days when I just need a quick fix. And that wetness? Yeah, it's a bit of a pain, but it's also why this stuff doesn't crease like crazy. It's hands-down the best dark circle solution I've found, but that fifth star? Still waiting on the standalone holy grail.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Super nice! A bit to get used to but one you do you will be using this every day! I love it and will definitely be buying this again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of my holy-grail products. I put it on, using the warmth from my fingers, right before my under eye concealer it brightens my dark circles so well. Unfortunately, Smashboxu2019s packaging is awful. The paint in the lid flakes off and is so difficult to brush off of my face! Please fix this issue.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is perfect for no make up make up. Smooth, light, and well hydrated. I havr tried so many concealers and colour correctors but none was as natural looking as this one. Unbeatable value for money. Definitely worth a try.

reviews.review_title: Color corrector for a black eye
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is great for my under eye circles but Iu2019m in my 30s and rarely wear full coverage face makeupu2014maybe on special occasions. Iu2019ll dab a little in my inner corners and spread it outwards and it color corrects and brightens without me needing to use too much, so I can keep a more natural look. Iu2019m writing this review specifically because I got a black eye at work and this worked well for covering that up!! The next day my coworkers said they couldnu2019t see it at all. This is the one time Iu2019ve found a bright side to my under eye circles being the color of bruisesu2026

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was so sad when Becca went out of business. Loved all products. Was so happy that Smashbox bought this under eye cream from Becca! It is easy to use - non drying - creamy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: As a tired nurse lacking sleep, this is the BEST concealer I have found to reduce dark circles! It also makes your eyes appear less puffy! I wish I had found this earlier as this is a STAPLE in my minimalistic makeup routine. I 100000% recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My light-medium olive skin has a high contrast with my very brown dark circles and this product doesn't cover them well enough. It's also very emollient so hydrating concealers are a no go over it. Works well with mattifying concealers though.   I think this will work for someone who has low contrast dark circles and wants a natural look. I'm gonna go back to my trusty orange correctors.

I took off one star because for some reason the product is drier now that  that itu2019s owned by Smashbox. I bought it for the first time when owned by Becca then bought a second one after they went out of business but Smashbox decided to sell the same product. Iu2019m thankful for that but they need to figure out why itu2019s drier than before. That makes it harder to apply even with moisturizer

reviews.review_text: Brightens the under eye area ok. However the formula is more like a hard wax. A little goes a long way and it will not work without warming it up (aka melting). Not worth the price or effort. Will not repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had never considered using an under-eye corrector until I tried a sample of this product; it brightened my eyes, so I decided to get the full size!

reviews.review_text: I swear by this product. I have dark blue/purple circles under my eye that normal concealer doesnu2019t cover as well. This totally neutralizes the discoloration under my eyes.

reviews.review_text: nothing short of AMAZING. blends so easily. perfect for someone on the go, like me!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: So creamy and perfect for concealing dark circles. I put it on before foundation and concealer and it makes a huge difference. A little goes a long way and it truly does correct and brighten. A+++++!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve heard great things about this product and have wanted to try it since before Smashbox started selling it. The corrector I was using has been discontinued so I figured Iu2019d finally give this a shot. I have very dark hereditary dark circles. This product does provide a good amount of color correction and illuminates the under eye but thereu2019s glitter in it! Once I blend it out I can clearly sees tiny glitter specs. Iu2019m sure this is for illumination but I personally donu2019t like to have any amount of glitter in my makeup, no matter how tiny. Also, this corrector is very creamer. Even after pressing powder on top, it doesnu2019t really set. I wear glasses so itu2019s very important that my concealer and corrector set or else my glasses will take it right off! Thatu2019s what happens with this. Iu2019ve already thrown away the box but if I hadnu2019t, Iu2019d be returning this. Iu2019m giving 2 stars only because it does color correct.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased this to colour correct and brighten under my eyes. I donu2019t always like the look of concealer and often skip it and I figured this would be a great alternative. When first opening the product, I noticed the smell which was of wax, like costume grease face paint. The first  2 ingredients are castor oil and wax.   When applying, it did appear to brighten the area and had light colour correction but it was very thick, sticky and oily. I found it would crease badly. And when I tried to put a bit of powder it was very patchy and made my under eyes look crinkly. Powder also impacted the brightening as I think a lot of the brightening is just from the light reflecting off the greasy shine it leaves. I tried it a few days and itu2019s just not for me. I will be returning asap. This does not live up to the hype.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I just couldn't get good results from this cream for my under eye circles. I think it might depend on what kind of dark circles you have and how your under eye area is shaped? I'm not sure. My dark circles are due mostly to having thinner skin in that area (hereditary plus being pretty fair) and the area being a bit sunken, as opposed to someone who might have skin discoloration in a small area or discoloration caused by lack of sleep. For me, it just didn't work. Not think enough to work as a concealer on it's ow, and alone just make me look kind of sparkly and way too white. But I also couldn't get it to work with concealer, either over or under. I think my under eye area is just too large for something like this. I've had much better luck with Pixi Correction and Bye Bye Undereye. I tried both the Fair/Light and Medium. Neither worked for me; I ended up returning both. Other than that, the consistency was good and it didn't dry out my under area, nor did it settle in the lines, so that was good.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is excellent under or over concealer .  I use a brush.  It is thick but is also hydrating. Refreshes your under eye . Soooo, if you lack of sleep, are hungover or allergies are killing you.  This is your PAL!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product is amazing!!! Really helps brighten under my eyes and reduces the appearance of dark circles.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is great! Need just a little either alone or under concealer. Helps with my dark circles a lot! Doesnu2019t crease when set with powder.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Was so happen when I saw smash box picked this product up. Great for fair skin and dark circles!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been looking like something like this for years. I have genetically very dark circles that prompt people to ask if Iu2019m okay if I donu2019t cover them. I wear this on its own without concealer and it looks so natural yet offers a shocking amount of camouflage. Over-concealed under eyes are so tacky to me and this product hits the perfect balance. At the end of the day, though, you will see a bit of shimmer as the product breaks up, but itu2019s extremely subtle. It appears dewy, not shimmery even though it reflects so much light. Trust the good reviews and try it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Something about this product is like magic! You look tired and have dark under eyes and BAM! Youu2019re awake again! This is a staple.

reviews.review_text: I had bought this product a few years ago when it was still Becca and returned it because I remember it creasing horribly. I've started seeing it a lot lately again and so many reviews were raving about it so I decided to take a chance and try it again. This time, I love it. I might have been using it wrong before, but I have not had any creasing issues and it helps so much to brighten the under eye area, making me use less concealer and other products. I don't have very dark under eyes to begin with but it's somehow still hard to cover it completely with concealer. I also have extremely dry skin and have been trying to add extra moisturizer to my under eye area this winter and this works well with all of my products. This product does not seem to dry my skin out, doesn't crease (but I use the smallest amount possible, just barely dipping my finger in, not piling the product on), and brightens well. The only thing I don't love is that it's kind of sticky and feels a bit dry and not moisturizing for a cream formula, so that's why I use very small amounts, but it's more than enough to get the job done. I top it off with Nars Creamy concealer and a tiny dab of Laura Mercier setting powder and it's perfect.

reviews.review_title: The BEST solution for purple blue under eyes
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am so grateful that Smashbox came to the rescue of Becca and has continued making the fair/light under eye brightening corrector! This is in my top five absolutely must have products for my daily routine. I am a very fair skinned neutral tone that leans a bit cool (I can see blue and green on the underside of my wrist) and I have always had vivid large purple-ish blue tones in my tear trough area.  Nothing else on the market will work like the Becca (now Smashbox) corrector does.    I bought the lightest Charlotte Tilbury color corrector in fair just to see if it was better and I can confidently say it is not! The Charlotte Tilbury packaging is more luxurious but it is also more matte and less brightening plus I feel like I'm paying a premium for the compact with the mirror on it.  I do my color correcting as part of my morning makeup routine and have never utilized the mirror during that time so the mirror is just an unnecessary expense.  Becca/Smashbox definitely got their packaging for this product perfect- you get more product and it's in a simple but cute glass jar.   If you are fair to light skinned and cursed with purple blue under eyes like me the Becca/ Smashbox is the best product I have ever found for this.   I will be absolutely gutted if this ever goes off the market. It is 100% worth it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was skeptical about trying this stuff but it has NOT disappointed! My under eyes look so great when I use this then either my foundation or concealer. I would HIGHLY recommend at least trying it. It warms up to my finger so easy when applying it and then perfectly to my under eye skin.

reviews.review_text: This corrector was not at all what I expected after seeing so many people raving about it on social media. The consistency is thick and kind of sticky, and it just sits on top of the skin. Also, it smells horrible -- as if it's expired! I had to wash it off because I could still smell it faintly after applying.

reviews.review_text: Listen, yu2019all. Iu2019ve tried them all. My dark circles are super deep and cannot even be touched by most brightening, color correcting, concealing tricks and tools. This does it. This is creamy, easy to apply, and blends well into the skin whether youu2019re going full glam or just color correcting so you donu2019t scare the good people of the grocery store. My only cons: it doesnu2019t last forever on its own, and there isnu2019t a tonnn of product in the packaging for frequent reapplications. I recommend setting spray before and after application, as it locks it in without affecting the consistency or color like Iu2019ve noticed some powders have a tendency to do. Forever repurchase.

It's not a miracle cure, but I like it more than more expensive products I've used in that area. It makes me look awake, and it doesn't irritate my sensitive eye area, which is huge for me. One caveat is that I now wear waterproof mascara when I use it. If you put it too close to your lash line, you will notice mascara smudging by the end of the day (and I don't even wear mascara on my bottom lashes).

Looking a little less tired is priceless for me :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the product, it's so creamy and blendable. Best thing is that it has no dimethicone (I have a weird allergy to it). It lays well under concealor and stays put for a while. I like to use my finger to apply it, I find it warms up the product and helps it melt into the skin.  The only thing I would say is a big misleading are the shades/swatch photos because they appear a lot darker than they do in real life. I'm roughly an NC42/44 and I found the shade medium/dark to be too light for me to cover my undereye hyperpigmentation and my dark circles aren't even THAT dark. So I found the Dark shade works better in covering my undereyes and hyperpigmentation around my mouth (the dark shade is about 2-3 shades darker than my complexion). It might be a personal preference thing too. I would suggest swatching the shades in store if possible to determine what will work for you.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I usually dont use concealer on my undereye cause it never really hides my dark circles however this one works like magic!  it instantly hides them! its also very lightweight!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love it, I hate undereye concealer and wanted something to cover my blue/purple undereyes and still look natural. I found this very easy to blend and long lasting. I used it on top of Clinique rich eye cream and didnu2019t set it with anything. I love how natural it looks while still making me look fresh and awake

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product. It doesnu2019t look cakey like concealer. I donu2019t have puffy undereyes and I can see how it could accentuate that. I am very pale and have dark circles. This provides great, instant coverage that lasts all day. I tried the kaja cat nap brightener and it did not cover as well as this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am new to color correcting products and this product came highly recommended from the Sephora agent. It is very smooth and you need just the smallest amount to cover up the dark circles or pigment under your eyes. I first use a light eye cream and then layer this product on top- only placing it on the dark areas. It blends nicely on top of the eye cream and then you can place your concealer over the top of the color corrector. I am 55 years old and I was truly amazed at the difference it made. I added just a touch of the Laura Mercier brightening power over the top and it set everything in place and did not crease. This color corrector can also be used on other parts of your face- covering red spots or blemishes. I love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_text: I received this product for free from Influenster In exchange for my review and thereu2019s what I think:  If you are a correctoru2019s user you will enjoy this product. It does exactly what it says, It Brightens. If you have dark circles and those blue/purple tones, This will cancel out those tones and give you a more even tone finish. I have medium olive skin and this shade was perfect. I feel like it had a small u201csalmonu201d tint to it which is great for correcting dark under eyes. I used it alone and with concealer on top of it and you can definitely see a difference. Cons: it is THICK and you have to apply it with your ring finger or a brush and I just feel like you can see streaks since the consistency is so thick and almost some what greasy. If youu2019re under eye creases a lot you may want to consider a lighter more self setting formula. Other than that, it does itu2019s job!   See picture for reference:  Right side has CORRECTOR + concealer  Left side: Has concealer ONLY

My only complaint is that it does tend to settle into fine lines over the course of the day so needs some updating/maintenance. But when its fresh, it looks great.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: ***SHADE: MEDIUM*** My skin: Im 34 and have light/light-med, neutral-cool/light-olive, combination skin with fairly prominent dark circles. I had never tried a color corrector for my under eye area, so I was excited to try this. At first I thought the color would be too deep (I have the shade u201cmediumu201d) but I think I was just confused by the fact that it was orange, because it actually does a great job cancelling out some of the dark purple in my under eye circles. It says itu2019s full coverage, but I find it to be more medium/buildable, which I prefer anyways. It feels nice and creamy to the touch, but Iu2019ve found you need to put it on immediately after an eye cream, and then quickly put concealer on top of that, in order for it to not get cakey-looking. And it does look nice at first, but I havenu2019t figured out how to make it not crease.. which is a big bummer, but that could be user error. Also, it says itu2019s u201cilluminatingu201d and u201clight reflectingu201d which usually means u201csparklyu201d, but I donu2019t notice any sparkle or shimmer, just a nice radiant finish. All in all, I will continue to use this and try to make it work (and not crease!) because I do like the coverage and the formula, but at this point I donu2019t think I would repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: *I received this product complimentary from Influenster & Smashbox in exchange for my honest review*  I've always wanted to try this product, and I'm so glad I had the opportunity! This is the missing step in my concealer routine. No matter what shade of concealer, no matter the formula, there was always a gray cast underneath my eyes....if you have hereditary dark circles, you know what I'm talking about lol there's no eye cream or LED therapy or amount of sleep that can fix them. Using this corrector in very specific spots neutralizes the darkness so it's undetectable. Then if I place concealer on top, set with a light amount of powder my dark circles are completely invisible! I highly recommend this to anyone who struggles like I do. It also feels moisturizing, but not greasy, and very lightweight. No discernable fragrance, and doesn't irritate my sensitive skin. For reference, I have medium to tan (range) skin with warm olive undertones and I use shade Medium.  I took one star off because it doesn't self-set so it absolutely requires powder if you plan to wear it on it's own. It's still Spring in FL right noe, so I can't comment on the sweat-resistance.

reviews.review_title: This is my under eye holy grail!

reviews.review_text: I am only 21 and I have severe dark circles. My eyes are legit purple under my eyes and I look dead half the time. I got a great concealer, but the color was still shining through! After some research, I decided to go with this product and I am glad I did! I use it under concealer and itu2019s super balmy and hydrating for my water proof concealer to sit on, but I also just use it alone! Itu2019s kind of yellow and I thought that it wouldnu2019t work on its own but after putting it on, my eyes are so much better! Itu2019s great for a natural brightness or under concealer for sure! It also melts into skin and feels like itu2019s really hydrating as well!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Works great under my eye. Wasnu2019t cakey. It looked great and blended well. Moderation is key.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been looking for a good color corrector for a long time and this does it for me!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Too orange for my skin tone, also it emphasized the texture I have under my eyes

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Great coverage. I find this easy to apply with my fingers and it does the job. I have also used it in a pinch for acne coverage and it works well. This is now the one product Iu2019m sure to put on before leaving the house.

reviews.review_title: Not what I expected, pleasantly surprised.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve used the original shade of this product on fair and lighter skinned clients back when I worked in beauty retailers. By the time they extended the shade range I had other correctors or always thought this one was too waxy or oily for me. Iu2019ve been using it the last few weeks and I like the brightness it gives me. A little goes a long way.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I saw a lot of good reviews for this product which is why I wanted to try it. So disappointed though. Itu2019s cakey, too thick, hard to blend in, and just looks terrible. I will be returning this ASAP.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I got this product free in exchange for a review. Doesnu2019t take a lot of this product to do the job. I can definitely tell a difference after adding. I like to add my normal concealer on top and it helps!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great concealer. I do my makeup a few times a week and sometimes I have dark circles under my eyes if I am tired or if I have other issues with my skin like dryness. I normally use a liquid concealer but I like this one much better. It provides great coverage and also does a great job at covering my blemishes on my face too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product. Itu2019s moisturizing and covers up my dark circles. It does go on a little tacky, but once smoothed out itu2019s perfect. I just let it dry, and put my fou ndation on over it. Iu2019ve also used this product to cover up dark spots on my skin and the pink undertone covers everything. I am very happy with this product and will continue using it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this for free in exchange for my review by Influenster. I love the creamy consistency and how bendable that made it. I'd say it did brighten up my under eye ares in general however, I don't feel like it did much in the way of covering up my dark circles, maybe just a tad but not much. It's an okay product but for the price I'd expect it to cover somewhat better.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I thought this lightener/character was very pretty. I really like the tone of it, and it applied well. I like the cream consistency. It offered nice coverage with minimal blending needed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have a lot of blue/green veins that are visible under my eye due to thin skin in that area and this is a must have product for cancelling out those colors before I add my skin tone concealer. I love the creamy texture because it doesnu2019t make my undereye dry and is super blendable.

reviews.review_title: Smashbox X Becca Under Eye Brightening Corrector
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The Smashbox X Becca Under Eye Brightening Corrector is awesome! The texture, the application and the overall look and feel of the corrector under my eyes is just purely STUNNING! It covers my dark circles and lasts all day! Highly recommend! 10/10!

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a pretty lovely product especially on those days where my dark circles are particularly noticeable. This definitely illuminates my undereye area while still keeping the coverage light and natural. It has the lightest hint of shimmer to it which I think helps illuminates and brighten my under eyes. I absolutely appreciate how natural this products looks on my skin. I can wear this alone or this blends seamlessly with other makeup and is also compatible with my skincare. This is a great product if dark circles are your target!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product is so creamy its wonderful I would definitely recommend it blends in great its not Cakey like some cream products are. Great color options

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free to try and I really liked it. It really helped on days I didn't want to wear a full face and just needed a little bit of coverage. The color was great. I liked the texture and wear time. All around great product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received these products for free from Influenster and Smahbox in exchange for my honest review.   This under eye concealer was pretty good. The only thing that I found challenging was the Application of the product to under my eyes. I did it with a small brush but maybe should have used a Beauty Blender mini.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A little goes such a long way under makeup. Found myself stocking up after one use. The range between is fair and medium is extremely drastic though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The packaging of this product is solid and minimalist. The formulation is creamy, it isn't drying and it blends easily. Because this product was sent to me in return for my opinion, I did not choose the shade. It honestly is a bit too pink for me, although it does help to camouflage my dark circles a bit. You can see a slight difference on with it on its on, and looks even better under concealer. The shade range is limited but overall this is a good product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this corrector. It's light weight and glides on easily. I just wish the dark fit all darker skin tones. But definitely try it out

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is definitely the type of product you buy if you either love the brands or want to try it something new. Doesnu2019t do what it claims to do? Sure. I think the shade range is a little bit too sparse and the colors scan a bit orange which for a color corrector might be good but it definitely depends on the personu2019s undertones. It is a bit thick and heavy and I donu2019t feel like the price justifies the product. Also. I thought Becca was going out of business.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Was okay didnu2019t really have an dramatic effects that I thought was worth it. Did itu2019s job like any other corrector.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was very happy with this product.  I have very fair skin and the fair/light worked great for me.  I like how creamy it is as well as light weight.  You donu2019t have to use very much to get good coverage, a little goes a long way.  It works well for covering dark circles under my eyes and worked well on its own for no makeup days and for when wearing foundation.  I would definitely recommend this to others.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This concealer definitely brightens. It was too light to color correct on me but it's a nice brightening concealer. I do have oily combination skin so it does break down faster than on other skin types. I am happy to have been gifted this concealer to try it. I would recommend for the reasons I stated above.

reviews.review_title: Lovely color corrector, just needs more shades!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was so excited to see that Smashbox would be carrying this because I never got to try it while Becca was still around. I was even more excited to receive it through influenster!  I have very dark under eyes circles, and this product is perfect for that. Itu2019s soft enough that it has a skin like finish, but itu2019s not so creamy that it moves around. I prefer to use it along with another concealer on fuller coverage days, but I can use this product alone on my natural makeup days.  I prefer applying with a small flash brush and blending out with my fingers.   I would definitely repurchase and I just wish the shade range was a little bigger

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Excellent coverage! Love how well it blends and covers my dark circles. It also blends well with my other makeup for a flawless coverage

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I ABSOLUTELY LOVE THIS, I have darkish under eyes and it most definitely helped lighten Them and made me look less like I have 2-3 hours of sleep in a night. Definitely recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoyed this product I think the consistency was perfect it did not feel heavy or uncomfortable. It still covered up my under eye bags without having to use a thicker concealer. It is worth the price in my opinion. I think everyone should give this product a shot!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been skeptical about under eye correctors and brighteners ever since they became popular on the market simply because Iu2019ve yet to find one product that works for me and my deeper complexion. Sometimes the peach tones show up sallow underneath my concealer or orange correctors feel a bit too heavy and deep one layered with my make up. I received this under eye brightening correct for my honest review, And let me tell you that skepticism completely went away after applying lightly with my finger and then blending out with a beauty sponge because the coverage and brightening effect was just *chefu2019s kiss*. Iu2019ve been using this corrector for a little over two weeks even on days where Iu2019m wearing lighter make up because I really love her brightening it is with even minimal product used. This will definitely be a product that Iu2019ll keep in my routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really liked this product. It went on smoothly and blended very well. I liked that I could wear this alone. It brightened up my undereyes and helped hide those dark circles.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i love it. It conceals your under eyes without looking like makeup. Can wear this with or without makeup on top. Completely brighten your eyes so you no longer look dead.

reviews.review_title: A little cakey but does the job!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Itu2019s alright, itu2019s a little cakey. But it does the job so I canu2019t complain. I have tried a few different ways to apply it but it still seems to be thick and textured on my skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Great. Very good coverage. Covered up my blemish. I gave it four stars because I have oily skin and it started to break down my foundation.
